title: Computational reconstruction of stochastic regulation: from transcriptional modules to network remodelling
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This ongoing international partnering award does not fund research directly, but through networking/ visiting schemes. To date, a highly successful workshop was organised in Edinburgh and two visits (one of UK people to Harvard and a return visit) have taken place. A Marie Curie application has been submitted. Further visits and a further workshop in the US are planned for the next year. Other Cultural
findingsText: This grant does not fund research directly but is to establish research connections. Dissemination and community building will eventually lead to impact. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
